content.body:
Dear Customer Support Team,

I hope this email finds you well. I recently booked a vacation package through your travel agency, and I'm experiencing an issue with it. Here are the details of my booking:

Booking Reference Number: [Booking Reference Number]
Booking Date: [Booking Date]
Destination: [Destination]
Package Type: [Package Type]
Total Cost: [Total Cost]

The problem I'm facing is [Customer Issue Description]. This has caused me inconvenience, and I'm looking for a prompt resolution.

I would greatly appreciate your quick attention to this matter. Please let me know how we can resolve this issue or if you require any additional information from my end.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
[Customer Name]
[Customer Email]
